summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5858 for the improvement of 10th Avenue Southwest, from West Cloverdale Street to approximately 35 feet north of West Thistle Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77209, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
